blogs.title: While my guitar gently weeps
blogs.body: I look at the floor and I see it needs sweeping
blogs.author: George Harrison

blogs.title: Hey Jude!
blogs.body: Dont make it bad, take a sad song and make it better
blogs.author: Paul McCartney

blogs.title: Yesterday
blogs.body: All my troubles seems so far away
blogs.author: John Lennon

blogs.title: With a little help from my friends
blogs.body: Would you believe in a love at first sight? Yes, I'm certain that it happens all the time
blogs.author: Ringo Starr
